title: Big Tech Is Spending Billions on AI Research. Investors Should Keep an Eye Out - The Wall Street Journal
content: Big Tech Is Spending Billions on AI Research. Investors Should Keep an Eye Out  The Wall Street Journal
description: If the past is any guide, the immense amount of research—this time in artificial intelligence—will spawn new products across medicine, new materials, climate and other areas. Investors would do well to stay tuned.
